column2: [seljuk.GetFirstName], perhaps the most able warrior in my realm, has called his tribe and many other hopefuls to war, declaring his intention to take the [seljuk_target_province.Duchy.GetFullBaseName] from [seljuk_target_ruler.GetBestName]!

Now that you have established your empire, most of the men under your command have taken up positions within your court and returned to their homes, eager to reap the rewards of their time spent in your campaigns.
